about_the_game:
Arcade Shop Simulator is an immersive first-person simulator where you step into the shoes of an ambitious entrepreneur, running a small but promising arcade shop. Your ultimate goal is to transform your humble establishment into the Ultimate Arcade Empire!

Build your collection of arcade cabinets by scouting deals, haggling with sellers, and carefully weighing factors like condition, size, and game popularity. Open your doors to eager teenagers ready to play. Collect your earnings, and make strategic choices: should you invest in new machines or repair the one you already have?

But running an arcade isn’t all fun and games! Keep your shop spotless and welcoming to earn good reviews and boost your reputation. A higher reputation means more traffic and higher profits.

Take your business to the next level by upgrading your tools. Fix machines faster, clean more efficiently with a vacuum cleaner, and automate cash transfer with wireless money collectors.

Unleash your creativity and personalize your arcade shop! Purchase decorations and furniture to give your shop a one-of-a-kind vibe that’ll wow your customers and enhance your reputation. And when your current space can't handle the hype, expand your empire by buying additional floorspace and making room for even more epic arcade experiences.

Are you ready to build the arcade of your dreams and dominate the world of gaming?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 MB available space

Customize with stylish accessories to make your shop truly yours. Out of room? Expand and build the ultimate arcade empire
